text:
ぽたぽたと、雫を垂らす前髪の隙間から、疲労感の滲む自分の目を見る。
気持ちよさそうに射精していた、男の後ろ姿を思い出して、鬼太郎は深々とため息をつく。
(水木さんのナカに出すなんて、想像したこともなかった……)
いや、ただしくは、実感を持って想像したことが、だ。
trans:
He catches glimpses through the wet bangs of his own eyes, colored by exhaustion.
He remembers the image of the back of the man as he came, just looking so satisfied, and Kitarou lets out a heavy sigh.
(I never had thought in my life, anyone could finish inside Ms. Mizuki……)
No, I had never, to be more accurate, imagined it as a real thing.
